scripts.sass: node-sass -w scss/ -o css/ -r && node-sass -w scss/media/xl.scss -o css/media/xl.css -r && node-sass -w scss/media/lg.scss -o css/media/lg.css -r && node-sass -w scss/media/md.scss -o css/media/md.css -r && node-sass -w scss/media/sm.scss -o css/media/sm.css -r && node-sass -w scss/media/xs.scss -o css/media/xs.css -r
